alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Hyde; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 5:28AM EDT until March 26 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Hyde County in eastern North Carolina... Northeastern Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... Southwestern Tyrrell County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 600 AM EDT. * At 527 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Belhaven, or 18 miles east of River Road, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Belhaven, Killkenny, Ponzer, Gum Neck, Kilkenny, Scranton, Fairfield, Pungo, Pike Road, Leechville, Terra Ceia, Lake Mattamuskeet, Frying Pan Landing, Pungo Lake, Alligator Lake, Long Acre VFD and Pantego. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
